title: Beautiful Renovated & Spacious 2 Bedroom Townhome
posting_body: Beautifully & newly renovated 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom 3-story townhome with its own private attached garage & driveway in a quiet and welcoming community that’s walking distance to all the places the neighborhood has to offer.

Featuring 1,650 square feet of living space with true condominium construction & soundproofing, the townhome also has a spacious den with a sliding door leading to its backyard that can be used as an office, playroom, or extra family room.
The open kitchen features stainless steel appliances and modern quartz countertops.
The main bedroom has its own walk-in closet & private bath.
Note: These photos are of a model home.
Color of cabinets and flooring may vary.
A comprehensive reusable tenant screening report made available to the landlord by a consumer reporting agency will not be accepted.
Available now at Martha Lake Townhomes!
for more information or to schedule a tour.
2 parking spaces: 1 inside garage, 1 in driveway
Just a few short blocks from Walgreens, Walmart, QFC, Safeway, and Starbucks for all your everyday necessities.
Located next to the I-5 and I-405 corridor; ideal for your convenient commutes.
For your days off, we are just minutes away from Alderwood Mall, Martha Lake recreations and walking distance to restaurants.
Income must be at least 2.5 times the rental rate
Utilities: Resident pays for electric, water, sewer, trash
Pet Policy: Pets welcome with some restrictions
